messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

installing and rebuild windows tuesday march pm installing rebuild hello please log queue installing rebuilding os thank great kind regards engineer ext

message.reasoning:

The nature of the request points towards a hardware-related issue, specifically the operating system installation. I've ruled out the other categories as they are not the best fit. I'm now certain this falls squarely within the "Hardware" domain.

Although there is no ideal category for "OS install", the action is more related to system setup. Now, I feel that "Internal Project" is the best fit, as there is no other suitable category.
